creditline: Gift of Edith and Norman Garmezy
description: woman seated at table; chair facing her unoccupied; page torn from a tablet (?); gray mat with silver trim around center
provenance: Edith and Norman Garmezy, Edina, MN; Garmezys acquired drawing from The Print Gallery, Warwick, MA, in 1985, at the Minneapolis Print and Drawing Fair
title: Woman at Table
